content.question: In the second paragraph, the author makes which of the following claims regarding the Class of 1990 ?

choices.label: They will lead more balanced lives after leaving Wellesley.
They will lead successful lives because of the quality of their education.
They are unlikely to follow conventional paths in life.
They are unlikely to change their opinions.

content.answer: They are unlikely to follow conventional paths in life.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
